remarks: A periodic piecewise continuous function, possibly undefined on a finite set in each periodic interval, is bounded.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

fourierdlem71.fxpt $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. dom F ) /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( F ` ( x + ( k x. T ) ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.

fourierdlem71.e $e |- E = ( x e. RR |-> ( x + ( ( |_ ` ( ( B - x ) / T ) ) x. T ) ) ) $.
